title: Bug 114470[Smoke] Error message throws when using new Date("3/2/2005") as value in table filter.
description: Use of new Date("3/2/2005") as value in table filter throws an error message.
OB: When using the value new Date("3/2/2005") in a table filter, an error message is thrown.
EB: When using the value new Date("3/2/2005") in a table filter, the filter should be applied without any error message.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Create a new datasource and a dataset containing a datetime column.
2. Insert a table and add a filter based on the datetime column.
3. In the value1 field of the filter, input new Date("3/2/2005").
eg.
